releases.title: Transfer from Figma
releases.body: Designers love Figma. And now it is possible to transfer designs right into After Effects. It's a lot like AEUX (because we built that too), but it's actually maintained and working great.

releases.title: Keyboard shortcuts
releases.body: One of the most requested features is finally here. Transfer layers between apps without even touching the mouse

releases.title: Rasterize layers from Ai
releases.body: Some layer are just to complex for Ae to draw with shape layers. Export them as PNGs by adding a `*` to the start of the layer name.

releases.title: Image exporting from Ai
releases.body: Transfer embedded images from Ai to Ae. Finally!

releases.title: Per-character text styling
releases.body: Until very recently, it was not possible to read the style changes, colors and kerning of individual Ai text layers. We fixed that with some new Adobe updates. Supported in Ae 24.3+.

releases.title: Accurate gradients
releases.body: Gradient end points from Ai used to get weird if you rotated the shape. They are solid as a rock now.
